name: HappyWife
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: happy wife
des:
Do you want to please your wife and make her smile? Use happy wife skill to compliment her, listen to jokes and advices. 
To start, just say "Alexa, open happy wife" to start the skill.
At any time, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
